duties_responsibilities.duty: Use domain modeling techniques to allow building best-in-class business products.
Structure software to be easy to understand, test, and evolve.
Build solutions that avoid single points of failure and use scalable architectural patterns.
Develop secure code to protect customers and the business from malicious actors.
Investigate and fix issues promptly to ensure they do not resurface in the future.
Ensure releases happen with zero downtime for end-users.
Write and read data in a way that is optimized for the company's needs.
Keep an eye on performance and identify and solve problems using the right approach.
Ensure systems are reliable and easy to operate.
Keep technologies and patterns up to date by continuous updating.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
